description: Monitor executed commands and arguments for actions that could be taken to create/modify tasks. Tasks may also be created through Windows system management tools such as [Windows Management Instrumentation](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1047) and [PowerShell](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1059/001), so additional logging may need to be configured to gather the appropriate data. Analytic 1 - Linux Command Execution index=linux_logs sourcetype=syslog "at" | rex "user=(?\w+)" Analytic 2 - Windows Command Execution index=windows_logs sourcetype=WinEventLog:System EventCode=4698 TaskName="at*" | where NOT (user="SYSTEM" AND TaskName="\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Defrag\\ScheduledDefrag")
